attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded, it started glitching and messing my phone up. This app is trash and runs way too slow. 🤮 Hated it. Disappointed in Apple for letting this app exist.

attributes.title: I WAS SCAMMED
attributes.review: They said if I give them my car, Dino nuggies, tv, and cats I wou ld get a million dollars and all my stuff back for trusting them no all I got back was a dusty button ugh I am crying I want my stuff back this is he worst don’t trust it

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: All I wanted was to keep up with our sweet Cheeto president but unfortunately what I got was a glitchy app that drains my battery and slows everything down. Just don’t download this.

attributes.title: Lags and Glitches
attributes.review: Horrible app. Got it to stay updated and far away from the banana Cheeto troll...turns out the app is hard to navigate, lags and glitches, and is just a terrible app lol

attributes.title: AN AWFUL APP
attributes.review:
What is love?
매일같이 영화 속에서나
책 속에서나 드라마 속에서 사랑을 느껴
Mmm 사랑을 배워
내 일처럼 자꾸 가슴이 뛰어 두근두근거려 
설레임에 부풀어 올라
Mmm 궁금해서 미칠 것만 같아
Ooh 언젠간 내게도
이런 일이 실제로 일어날까
그게 언제쯤일까? 어떤 사람일까?
I wanna know 사탕처럼 달콤하다는데
I wanna know 하늘을 나는 것 같다는데
I wanna know know know know
What is love? 사랑이 어떤 느낌인지
I wanna know 하루 종일 웃고 있다는데
I wanna know 세상이 다 아름답다는데
I wanna know know know know
What is love? 언젠간 나에게도 사랑이 올까
지금 이런 상상만으로도
떠올려만 봐도 가슴이 터질 것 같은데
Mmm 이렇게 좋은데
만일 언젠가 진짜로 내게
사랑이 올 때 난 울어버릴지도 몰라
Mmm 정말 궁금해 미칠 것만 같아
Ooh 언젠간 내게도
이런 일이 실제로 일어날까
Ooh, ooh, ooh 그게 언제쯤일까? 어떤 사람일까?
I wanna know 사탕처럼 달콤하다는데
I wanna know 하늘을 나는 것 같다는데
I wanna know know know know
What is love? 사랑이 어떤 느낌인지
I wanna know 하루 종일 웃고 있다는데
I wanna know 세상이 다 아름답다는데
I wanna know know know know
What is love? 언젠간 나에게도 사랑이 올까
지금 세상 어느 곳에 살고 있는지

attributes.title: Worst App in the history of American Apps 😩😩😩😩😩😩😩😩😩
attributes.review: I wouldn’t give it a star, this app crashed my phone and my home. This app brought nothing but misery in my life. DO NOT DOWNLOAD, I repeat DO NOT DOWNLOAD for the better purpose of our country

attributes.title: worst app
attributes.review: THIS IS THE WORST APP EVER! i can’t believe the things you see on here. And all the people saying the most terrible things ever. This app should not exist it is so slow and I can’t believe that the App Store let it be on.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app immediately ruined my phone from the glitches. This app is terrible I do not recommend. It needs to be deleted as well as the president.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: absolutely HORRIBLE app. i downloaded it, put my phone down to go get some water, came back, and my phone had turned into a bag of cheetos. i’m writing this from my sisters nintendo DS. i’m so disappointed and sad

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP BUNKER BOY
attributes.review: i downloaded this app but then i forgot about it because i had to walk my microwave. while i was cooking silverware and washing my lasagna, though, i remembered! i had to lotion my clothes!!!!!!! anyways, bunker boy. you ban us, we ban you.
